vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
ὑπεραυξ-άνω
and ὑπεραύξ-ω, increase above measure:—passive, to be so increased, [Refs 2nd c.AD+]; become over-powerful, [Refs 5th c.BC+]
__2 passive also, grow above, ὑπεραύξονται τῶν ἀμπέλων [Refs 5th c.BC+]
__II intransitive in active, grow or abound exceedingly, ὑπεραυξήσας (of a fish) Callisth. cited in [NT+5th c.AD+]
vocabInfos.shortDef: to grow more and more, increase abundantly
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
to grow more and more, increase abundantly
to increase exceedingly, grow more and more 2Thess. 1:3*
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition: 大量成長, 成長驚人 (帖後 1:3)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition: 大量成长, 成长惊人 (帖后 1:3)
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: tăng trưởng vượt; gia tăng nhiều gấp bội
